response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, but recognizing its importance to you, we are extending an exclusive offer to purchase it at a special price of $14,000. We believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition that allows both parties to benefit. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of prompt delivery and unparalleled customer support. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
